main event: A bright green object the size of 3-4 stars was observed moving rapidly across the sky with irregular pulsations for 2-3 minutes.
interesting points: The object moved very rapidly and had no sound.
The observer stated that this sighting was similar to one reported by his wife and daughter on the same date and location.
The sighting occurred at 11:50 PM local time.
The report notes that no other report was found in the files.
The observation was classified as a 'ground-visual' type.
sighted object: bright green object 3-4 times the size of a star
witnesses: observer and their wife and daughter
